Several NSGs contain rules that allow direct RDP access to the virtual machines by bypassing bastion1.

You need to ensure that the virtual machines can be accessed only by using bastion1. The solution must prevent the use of NSG rules to bypass bastion1.

What should you include in the solution?

choices.B: Azure Virtual Network Manager connectivity configurations
choices.A: Azure Virtual Network Manager security admin rules

discussion.content:

Security admin rules take precedence over NSGs.

Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps is a cloud-native security solution that helps protect your organization from cyber threats across cloud applications and services, including web browsing. It includes web content filtering capabilities that allow you to block access to websites that contain adult content, such as gambling sites, and other categories of websites that you want to block.

To implement this solution, you can configure web content filtering policies in Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps and apply them to your Windows 11 devices. This will prevent users from accessing websites that are not allowed by the policy.

Compliance Manager is a solution that helps you manage regulatory compliance requirements for Microsoft cloud services, and Microsoft Endpoint Manager and Microsoft Defender for Endpoint are solutions for securing and managing endpoint devices, but neither of these solutions specifically provide web content filtering capabilities.

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

You plan to deploy a dynamically scaling, Linux-based Azure Virtual Machine Scale Set that will host jump servers. The jump servers will be used by support staff who connect from personal and kiosk devices via the internet. The subnet of the jump servers will be associated to a network security group (NSG).

You need to design an access solution for the Azure Virtual Machine Scale Set. The solution must meet the following requirements:

• Ensure that each time the support staff connects to a jump server, they must request access to the server.
• Ensure that only authorized support staff can initiate SSH connections to the jump servers.
• Maximize protection against brute-force attacks from internal networks and the internet.
• Ensure that users can only connect to the jump servers from the internet.
• Minimize administrative effort.

What should you include in the solution? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
1.Manage NSG rules by using: Just-in-time (JIT) VM access.
2.Only allow SSH connections to the jump servers from: AzureBastionSubnet.

1. Just-in-time (JIT) VM access helps ensure that support staff must request access each time they connect to a jump server, and it restricts access to authorized users only. This minimizes the risk of brute-force attacks by keeping management ports closed until access is explicitly requested and approved12.

2. Azure Bastion provides secure and seamless SSH connectivity to your virtual machines directly over TLS from the Azure portal. By allowing SSH connections only from the AzureBastionSubnet, you ensure that users can only connect to the jump servers from the internet, while protecting the VMs from exposure to the public internet3

questions.question_text:
Your company has a main office and 10 branch offices. Each branch office contains an on-premises file server that runs Windows Server and multiple devices that run either Windows 11 or macOS. The devices are enrolled in Microsoft Intune.

You have a Microsoft Entra tenant.

You need to deploy Global Secure Access to implement web filtering for device traffic to the internet. The solution must ensure that all the web traffic from the devices in the branch offices is controlled by using Global Secure Access.

What should you do first in each branch office?

choices.B: Configure an IPsec tunnel on the router.
choices.A: Configure an Intune policy to onboard Microsoft Defender for Endpoint to each device.
choices.D: Configure an Intune policy to deploy the Global Secure Access client to each device.
choices.C: Install the Microsoft Entra private network connector on the file server.
